item.title: WebGuard: Building a Generalizable Guardrail for Web Agents
item.description: arXiv:2507.14293v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The rapid development of autonomous web agents powered by Large Language Models (LLMs), while greatly elevating efficiency, exposes the frontier risk of taking unintended or harmful actions.
